Sophia provided initial feedback indicating alignment with the proposal but requested clarification on implementation support.
Both parties agreed to move discussions to Slack for faster communication.

Email_Draft.subject: Follow-up on Proposal for Salesforce Upgrade
Email_Draft.body:
Hi Sophia,

I hope this message finds you well. I wanted to follow up on the proposal I sent and see if you had any further questions or needed additional information regarding the implementation support. We are keen to move forward and align with your internal timelines.

Looking forward to your feedback!

Best,
Bruce

AI_GENERATED_FOLLOW_UP.Slack_Message: Hi Sophia, just checking in to see if your team had a chance to review the proposal. Let me know if you need anything else from my side!
